divs: Sighting DetailsI was setting on my front Porch talking on the Phone to a friend from Ohio when I noticed a star like orb moving real slow and low this time to the ground at first I thought it was a plain then noticing no blinker lights on it I ran in the house to grab my Binoculars and what I seen was a glowing pulsating light. The orb then made a turn onto a different direction in midair and as it was going it became dim to my eye's and dissipated. My mom also is a witness to seeing it also.
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Sunbury
There were no other sightings in Sunbury on or around July 18th 2009
Summary: Seen Star light object or as know orb flying real low over mountain
